ModulePrefs.title: Facebook Like Box
ModulePrefs.author: Mohamed Abo El-Ghranek
ModulePrefs.description: Get your facebook page on blogger

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">

var url = prefs.getString("url");
var style = prefs.getString("style");
var height = prefs.getString("height");

document.write('<iframe allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" src="//www.facebook.com/plugins/likebox.php?href='+url+'&width=340px&height='+height+'px&colorscheme='+style+'&show_faces=true&header=false&stream=false&show_border=false&appId=492409184153294" style="border:none; overflow:hidden; width:100%; height:'+height+'px;"></iframe>');

   </script>
